query:
SELECT t.id, t.codigo, t.cursos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM formandos WHERE turmaId = t.id) as total_formandos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos WHERE turmaId = t.id) as total_eventos
FROM turmas t 
WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM formandos WHERE turmaId = t.id)
  AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM eventos WHERE turmaId = t.id)
ORDER BY t.id DESC 
LIMIT 5;

  AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM eventos WHERE turmaId = t.id)
